name: Space Fighterz
description:
You are an ordinary fighter pilot of the Bagone Empire. You were recently tasked with protecting some cargo that is about to be transported near the edge of the Empire. You set out with your fellow Bagone pilots, not knowing the dangers you are about to face........

Features

  • Fun gameplay!
  • 10 Missions!
  • Custom AI!
  • Five enemy types!
  • Four Factions!
  • Space shooting!
  • Asteroids!
  • Fitting music!
  • EXPLOTIONS!!!

Made with Unity
